kernel.description: Deterministic coordination layer and evidence ledger.
best_practices: Treat coordination.db as the single source of truth.
Never bypass kernel APIs with raw SQL writes.
Record evidence before completion.
Keep migrations idempotent and append-only.
Use read-only DB connections for analysis.

bundled_modules.description: Interfaces and toggle behavior for bundled modules.
best_practices: Define module interfaces before implementations.
Module-off behavior must be deterministic missing_prereqs.
Never let modules bypass kernel APIs.
Keep interface surfaces small and stable.

bundled_modules.description: Capability registry + grants with explainable eligibility.
best_practices: Capability IDs are stable and kernel-owned.
Skill-to-capability mapping lives in userland config.
Eligibility decisions must be explainable.
Capability changes require migration + docs update.

bundled_modules.description: Compile standards into deterministic contracts and hashes.
best_practices: Contract output must be deterministic for the same inputs.
Version standards; never mutate in place.
Store contract hashes in attempts and evidence.
Reject missing inputs early and explicitly.

bundled_modules.description: Hot authority + cold reference with traceable retrieval.
best_practices: Hot knowledge overrides cold reference.
All retrievals are traceable as evidence.
Chunk lifecycle must be deterministic.
Never write directly to coordination.db.

bundled_modules.description: Deterministic context assembly from contracts and knowledge.
best_practices: Context bundles must be deterministic and cacheable.
Missing prerequisites are explicit and reviewable.
No hidden data sources; list all inputs.
Bundle hashes must be stable.

bundled_modules.description: Evidence bundles + validators for completion gates.
best_practices: Evidence bundles are append-only.
Validators are pure and deterministic.
Completion gates reference evidence types.
Store validator results in the ledger.
Module enablement is explicit and versioned.
Kernel must work with modules disabled.
Config defaults are read-only seeds.
Per-module data is non-authoritative.

bundled_modules.description: Deterministic scaffolding for programs and projects.
best_practices: Scaffolds are deterministic and repeatable.
Templates never hide required evidence.
Optional register writes go through Work Compiler.
Generated files follow FILE-POLICY.

bundled_modules.description: Signed work receipts + provenance ledger for verified execution.
best_practices: Receipts are immutable and append-only.
Ledger entries reference evidence bundle hashes.
Signing keys are rotated and auditable.
Ledger writes flow through kernel APIs.

bundled_modules.description: Registry of IP assets, owners, license terms, and usage rules.
best_practices: Asset IDs are stable and namespace-scoped.
License terms are machine-readable.
Usage attribution references ledger entries.
Access policies are enforced by proof gates.

bundled_modules.description: Brokerage layer for licensing IP and routing verified work.
best_practices: Transactions reference asset and ledger entries.
Pricing and usage terms are explicit.
Execution proofs are required for settlement.
No exchange writes bypass policy gates.
